companions_stunts.description: Advancements and special powers available to PCs who complete the Companions questline.

breath_of_ysgramor.name: Breath of Ysgramor
breath_of_ysgramor.unlock_flavor: As Kodlak's spirit ascends toward Sovngarde, a warmth passes through you - not the wild heat of the beast, but something older and cleaner. Ysgramor's ancestors acknowledge the deeds done in honor.
breath_of_ysgramor.effect: Invoke the warrior-spirit of Ysgramor's legacy. Choose one: (a) clear all physical stress and one mild consequence, drawing on the resolve of generations of Companions; or (b) add +3 to a single Fight roll as the Harbinger's authority fills your arm.

scaling.base: Once per session, choose option (a) or (b).
scaling.upgraded: At a major milestone after completing the arc, unlock both options per session.

breath_of_ysgramor.aspect_notes: Once per session when using this power, the PC may also create the 'Harbinger's Legacy' scene aspect with 1 free invoke representing the Companions' morale rising at their leader's example.
breath_of_ysgramor.notes: This power is only fully unlocked if Kodlak was cured before death (companions_state.kodlak_cured == true). If Kodlak was not cured, the power still unlocks but only option (b) is available - the beast-taint in the legacy means the healing aspect of option (a) is unavailable.

werewolf_form.name: Werewolf Form
werewolf_form.unlock_flavor: The blood ignites through you and the world becomes prey-sharp. You are wolf now.
werewolf_form.cost: Once per session; lasts one scene
werewolf_form.effect: Transform into beast form for one scene. While transformed: (1) Bestial Strength & Endurance: +2 Fight and +2 Physique; (2) Pursuit of Prey: you may move up to 2 zones with a single move if not blocked; (3) Gorging: with a Taken Out/helpless body in your zone, you may Overcome with Physique to feed (Fair +2, or Good +3 if actively threatened). On success: Humanoid clears 2 physical stress OR clears one Moderate physical consequence; Wildlife clears 1 physical stress OR clears one Mild physical consequence. Cannot clear Severe. Limits: once per exchange.
stunts: Werewolf Physiology: Your claw/teeth attacks are Weapon:2.

Rampaging Strikes: When you Attack with Fight in beast form, choose a primary target. If you deal shifts to the primary target, you may also deal splash stress to other enemies in the same zone equal to half the shifts (rounded up), max 2 stress per extra target.
limitations: Cannot use social skills (Rapport, Empathy, Deceive) in beast form.
Cannot use weapons/shields/armor extras while transformed; you fight with claws/teeth.
CANNOT USE THE THU'UM WHILE TRANSFORMED (no shouts in werewolf form).
Silvered attacks bypass beast defenses and prevent gorging healing for one full exchange.
Fire damage prevents gorging healing for one full exchange.
werewolf_form.end_of_scene: Make a Will roll vs Fair (+2) or take a mild mental consequence 'Shame of the Wolf'. If you gorged on a humanoid this scene, difficulty is Good (+3).

scaling.level_2_unlock: GM discretion: unlock one stunt (Alpha's Howl or Bloodscent).
scaling.level_3_unlock: GM discretion: unlock one stunt (Tempered Regeneration or Predator Leap).

werewolf_form.notes: This replaces the old fixed-skill implementation that could nerf high-Fight PCs. Only available if embraced_curse == true. Kodlak views this power with sadness; using it in his presence costs 1 trust with Kodlak. Skjor approves (+1 trust with Skjor when used effectively).

oath_of_ysgramor_proto.name: Oath of Ysgramor (Proto-Breath)
oath_of_ysgramor_proto.effect: Choose one: (a) clear one physical stress box; or (b) gain +2 to a single Will roll to resist fear, temptation, or bloodlust.
oath_of_ysgramor_proto.notes: This bridges the refusal path until Breath of Ysgramor unlocks at the finale.

oath_of_ysgramor.name: Oath of Ysgramor
oath_of_ysgramor.unlock_flavor: You refuse the beast blood. In its place, you swear the older oath: to carry Ysgramor's legacy without stain.
oath_of_ysgramor.cost: Permanent (Purity Track). Includes once-per-session and once-per-scene stunts.

bane_of_mer.effect: Against Mer (Altmer, Dunmer, Bosmer, Orsimer): when you Attack, gain +1 to your 4dF result.

tongue_of_the_ancestors.use_thuum_bonus: +2 to 4dF result on any Thu'um action roll (Attack/Overcome/Create Advantage).

learning_discount.difficulty: Halve learning difficulty (round up), minimum Fair (+2). Example: Great (+4) -> Fair (+2), Superb (+5) -> Great (+3).
learning_discount.clock: Halve clock requirements for learning/mastery tracks started after swearing the Oath (e.g., 8->4, 10->5).

stunts: Second Wind (Once per Session): Overcome with Physique or Will (Good +3; Great +4 in combat). On success, choose: clear up to 6 total stress ticks OR clear up to two consequences (mild/moderate only). Cannot clear Severe. On failure, clear 3 stress ticks but take a cost (1 mental stress or enemy boost).

Bladestorm (Once per Scene): Overcome with Fight or Shoot (Fair +2 if outnumbered; Good +3 if disciplined foes). On success, immediately Attack every enemy in your zone. Roll once, each enemy defends separately. Treat this attack as Weapon:1.
limitations: Bad Blood: Against Mer, all social rolls to gain favor, lie, persuade, or intimidate take -2 to 4dF result.
oath_of_ysgramor.notes: Purity alternative to lycanthropy. Intended to be competitive with Werewolf Form without stacking.
